verses.verse: My son,<WH1121> if<WH518> you will receive<WH3947> my sayings,<WH561> And treasure<WH6845> my commandments<WH4687> within<WH854> you,
Make<WH7181> your ear<WH241> attentive<WH7181> to wisdom,<WH2451> Incline<WH5186> your heart<WH3820> to understanding;<WH8394>
For if<WH518> you cry<WH7121> for discernment,<WH998> Lift<WH5414> your voice<WH6963> for understanding;<WH8394>
If<WH518> you seek<WH1245> her as silver,<WH3701> And search<WH2664> for her as for hidden<WH4301> treasures;<WH4301>
Then<WH227> you will discern<WH995> the fear<WH3374> of the Lord,<WH3068> And discover<WH4672> the knowledge<WH1847> of God.<WH430>
For the Lord<WH3068> gives<WH5414> wisdom;<WH2451> From His mouth<WH6310> [come] knowledge<WH1847> and understanding.<WH8394>
He stores<WH6845> up sound<WH8454> wisdom<WH8454> for the upright;<WH3477> [He is] a shield<WH4043> to those who walk<WH1980> in integrity,<WH8537>
Guarding<WH5341> the paths<WH734> of justice,<WH4941> And He preserves<WH8104> the way<WH1870> of His godly<WH2623> ones.<WH2623>
Then<WH227> you will discern<WH995> righteousness<WH6664> and justice<WH4941> And equity<WH4339> [and] every<WH3605> good<WH2896> course.<WH4570>
For wisdom<WH2451> will enter<WH935> your heart,<WH3820> And knowledge<WH1847> will be pleasant<WH5276> to your soul;<WH5315>
Discretion<WH4209> will guard<WH8104> you, Understanding<WH8394> will watch<WH5341> over you,
To deliver<WH5337> you from the way<WH1870> of evil,<WH9563> From the man<WH376> who speaks<WH1696> perverse<WH8419> things;<WH8419>
From those who leave<WH5800> the paths<WH734> of uprightness,<WH3476> To walk<WH1980> in the ways<WH1870> of darkness;<WH2822>
Who<WH8056> delight<WH8056> in doing<WH6213> evil,<WH9563> And rejoice<WH1523> in the perversity<WH8419> of evil;<WH9563>
Whose<WH834> paths<WH734> are crooked,<WH6141> And who are devious<WH3868> in their ways;<WH4570>
To deliver<WH5337> you from the strange<WH2114> woman,<WH802> From the adulteress<WH5237> who flatters<WH9140> with her words;<WH561>
That leaves<WH5800> the companion<WH9017> of her youth,<WH5271> And forgets<WH7911> the covenant<WH1285> of her God;<WH430>
For her house<WH1004> sinks<WH7743> down<WH7743> to death,<WH4194> And her tracks<WH4570> [lead] to the dead;<WH7496>
None<WH3605> <WH3808> who go<WH935> to her return<WH7725> again, Nor<WH3808> do they reach<WH5381> the paths<WH734> of life.<WH9132>
So<WH4616> you will walk<WH1980> in the way<WH1870> of good<WH2896> men,<WH2896> And keep<WH8104> to the paths<WH734> of the righteous.<WH6662>
For the upright<WH3477> will live<WH7931> in the land,<WH776> And the blameless<WH8549> will remain<WH3498> in it;
But the wicked<WH7563> will be cut<WH3772> off<WH3772> from the land,<WH776> And the treacherous<WH898> will be uprooted<WH5255> from it.
